summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Clipper Beard Trimmer Kit for Men,Cordless Hair Trimmer Mustache Trimmer Body Groomer Trimmer for Nose Ear Facial Hair with LED Display USB Rechargeable 5 In 1 Review Date: 2020/08/19 Store: 8sanlione Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.77 x 1.18 inches; 1.12 Pounds'} Review Text: Clippers work great. My husband was able to trim his hair and beard with ease. Battery lasted decently & I love that it comes with a wide range of accessories. Review Title: Great Clippers Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded） Review Date: 2020/08/26 Store: styleagal Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'} Review Text: I’m new to trying to do my own nails.
I really like all the accessories that came in this budget friendly kit. It worked great for my beginner skills. Review Title: Beginner approved Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces. Review Date: 2020/08/26 Store: Qiray Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'} Review Text: These hair ties are too pretty to be hair ties, my daughter actually uses them more as bracelets because their too pretty. She loves the little "pearls" on them. She has worn them in her hair though and she has long semi-thick hair and they work great holding her hair up and together. Review Title: Love these Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Conditioner to Grow, Thicken, Moisturize and Protect Your Beard, 8.5 oz. Review Date: 2020/09/08 Store: Mr. Pristine Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '8.5 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.5 x 2.36 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801825', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'} Review Text: This conditioner goes in smooth and washes out good, but my beard doesn't feel any smoother than it did beforehand, it is actually drying out my husbands beard. Review Title: so so Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz. Review Date: 2020/09/08 Store: Mr. Pristine Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'} Review Text: This shampoo smells good, lathers good, and washes out good, but its actually drying my beard out. I even used it with the duo conditioner, & it just isn't for me. Review Title: so so Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Acrylic Nail Powder Set Vcedas 24 Colors Acrylic Nail Art Tips UV Gel Carving Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: Vcedas Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 1.3 Pounds'} Review Text: These colors are so pretty. The packaging was nice. The glitter works as expected and looks so nice on the nails. Also, the containers are decent size so this should last me for a very long time Review Title: Beautiful Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rhinestone Padded Headband Bejewled Crystal Wide Velvet Hairband Sparkly Wedding Party Headband Hair Accessories For Women Girls (silver) Review Date: 2020/09/21 Store: MOLOCH Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'Silver', 'Material': 'Rhinestone, Crystal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Brand': 'MOLOCH', 'Size': 'Small', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 6.42 x 1.57 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '783911261172'} Review Text: This headband is really cute.
I got it for my 7 year old daughter, she is super girly and it doesn't get much more girly than this headband.
It is very pretty, and really well made, sparkles so much,.
It does fit my daughters head nicely, and the inside is soft, but I don't like how THICK the band is.
Regardless, it's still a good buy. Review Title: Fashionable Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Padded Rhinestone Crystal Headbands For Women Girls Sparkly Colorful Bejewled Wide Velvet Hairband Party Headpiece Headwear Statement Hair Accessory (multicolor Rhinestone) Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: FAERLIIRY Average Rating: 2.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'multi color', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'party', 'Material': 'Glass,Metal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Package Dimensions': '7.01 x 6.85 x 1.65 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SXDCE3421', 'UPC': '789615343381'} Review Text: My 7 year loves this headband.
It's beautiful, and fits her head good.
Seems well made & I don't see any loose jewels, or stitching.
I don't like how thick it is though, it stands taller width wise on the head. Review Title: Pretty Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mynena Bright Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Palette UV Glow Colorful Colors Review Date: 2020/09/22 Store: Mynena Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mynena', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 5.16 x 0.79 inches; 9.88 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:914370ab89a7edd6f40118e2412a9b5d]] Boy, does this pallet shine!
It's probably one of the prettiest pallets I've gotten off Amazon yet.
The swatches were nice and bright.
The pallet came unbroken, and just looks so beautiful. Review Title: Shines Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mcwdoit Poly Nail Gel Kit, 48W Nail Lamp 15ml 10 Colors UV Nail Gel with Top Coat, Base Coat, Slip Solution, Nail Manicure Tools Review Date: 2021/02/17 Store: mcwdoit Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'mcwdoit', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 8.35 x 6.46 inches; 3.55 Pounds'} Review Text: This nail kit really have everything you need and more...
With covid going on, I am new at doing nails at home, but I am trying and this is a perfect beginners kit. There so much stuff I honestly haven't gotten around to using it all yet. For the price and the amount of things you get, its defiantly a great buy. Review Title: Beginners Kit Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sorry Mom Tattoo Balm & Tattoo Healing Ointment for New Tattoos - Soothing Tattoo Salve - Intense Tattoo Aftercare Cream - Reduces Itching, Redness & Promotes Healing of Newly Tattooed Skin (3.4 oz) Review Date: 2021/11/10 Store: Sorry Mom Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sorry Mom', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Item Weight': '250 Grams', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.71 x 2.36 x 1.57 inches; 8.82 Ounces'} Review Text: I didn't notice any special healing effects from it.
So maybe it works for some and not all. Review Title: Unsure Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Canple Self-cleaning Slicker Brush for Medium Long Hair Types Dog and Cat, Removes Loose Hair Undercoat Effectively Reduce Mats & Tanglings Grooming Brush Review Date: 2021/11/10 Store: Canple Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Canple', 'Special Feature': 'Self Cleaning', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '10.16 x 6.3 x 2.2 inches; 8.82 Ounces'} Review Text: I'd recommend more for dogs than for cats, because the brush is big, which is understandably intimidating to my cat. Review Title: for dogs Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: StudentsZone Fashion Headbands for Women, Cute Bow Headband for Spa, Makeup or Washing Face, No Slip Head Bands for Girls ( 1 * Pink Polka Dot + 1* Pink Leopard ) Review Date: 2021/11/11 Store: StudentsZone Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Color': 'Pink', 'Material': 'Fleece', 'Fabric Type': 'Fleece', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '13.35 x 10 x 2.17 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: I got these for my 8 year old daughter and sadly they were too small!
She said they were too tight on her head, and indeed they were, so unfortunately she didn't get to use them.
She has an average size head, so I'd say these are made more for like 5-6 year olds. Review Title: Too small Rating: 2.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Shopping Behavior:**

- **Grooming Products:** Strong preference for grooming tools, specifically hair and beard products, indicating a focus on personal care and maintenance.
- **Nail Care:** Frequent purchases of nail care kits and accessories, suggesting an interest in DIY nail beauty and possible enjoyment of creative expression through nail art.
- **Fashion Accessories:** Purchases of stylish hair accessories reflect a taste for aesthetic appeal and trendiness, particularly for younger family members.
- **Home and Family Care:** Items catered to family needs, including grooming for pets, highlight a nurturing aspect of the buyer's behavior.
- **User-Friendly Products:** Preference for beginner-friendly kits and budget-friendly options emphasizes practical shopping habits and sensitivity to value.
- **Quality Awareness:** Consistency in seeking products that are well-reviewed but exhibit varied satisfaction levels, denoting a discerning approach towards product quality.
- **Trendy Items:** Emphasis on fashionable designs and trendy colors indicates an engagement with current beauty and fashion trends.
- **Mixed Results:** Experiences with product effectiveness vary widely, suggesting ongoing exploration in finding the best matches for personal and family needs.

target_interaction.title: Not for me
target_interaction.text:
Maybe I'm doing it wrong, since I'm a beginner, but didn't work well for us.
More of a mess than anything.
target_interaction.title_meta: Dip Powder Nail Starter Kit 8 Colors Acrylic Dipping Powder System for French Nail Manicure Nail Art Set, Portable Kit for Trave, No LED Nail Lamp Needed…
